item.title: Leaves need clearing on Oglander Road, 3rd December
item.description:
Hello everyone. Would it be possible to do some leaf-clearing on Oglander Road? Some has been done, but there are still a lot to get rid of on pavements and on the roads, especially in around the curbs. Many thanks, Patrick
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 116, Oglander Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping rubbish in alleyway at back of wigeon path(garden's gates), 3rd December
item.description:
Rubbish was damped there for more than 2 weeks. Also condoms on the floor. Discusting. When the workers swipe the roads near car parks never do the alleyway. All rubbish and leaves go there. I also pay for the service why do I always have to do it myself. Can workers do that bit as well when cleaning the road?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Goosander Way, Thamesmead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bulbs have been pulled up and laying on top of the earth, 3rd December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Chandos Avenue, Whetstone, Greater London

item.title: Bags left by roadsweeper, 3rd December
item.description:
The road was finally swept yesterday, after more than a month. The road sweeper left a large number of bags, which have now been here since yesterday morning. They are already attracting more litter and will be ripped open and the contents spread about if not removed promptly.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Ingledew Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned caravan located in Crabtree Manorway South, Belvedere., 3rd December
item.description:
There is an abandoned caravan located in Crabtree Manorway South, Belvedere. Due to its condition, the caravan is causing a potential hazard to other vehicle users and pedestrians. I would be grateful if Bexley Council could take action to identify the registered owner and remove the caravan as soon as possible please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crabtree Manorway South, Lower Belvedere, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
